name: ScienceQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open science questions”
”Alexa, start science questions”
”Alexa, launch science questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: science questions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Science Questions" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge about the world of science of chemistry and biology. Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.
The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
